entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
